mapper.select: select wordno, title, date_format(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, link, keyword, thumbnail, description from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} order by wordNo desc limit #{startRow},#{showNum}

select wordno, title, date_format(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, link, keyword, thumbnail, description from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' or keyword like '%${keyword}%' ) order by wordNo desc limit #{startRow},#{showNum}
select link from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' or keyword like '%${keyword}%' )
select count(*) from bookmark where userno = #{userNo} and (title like '%${keyword}%' or description like '%${keyword}%' or keyword like '%${keyword}%' )
SELECT count(*) FROM bookmark where userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into bookmark (wordno, title, regDate, link, keyword, thumbnail, description, userno ) values (null, #{title}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , #{link}, #{keyword}, #{thumbnail} , #{description}, #{userNo})
select last_insert_id()

choose.when: delete from bookmark where wordNo = #{wordNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
choose.otherwise: delete from bookmark where link=#{link} and userNo=#{userNo}

mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where link = #{link} and userNo = #{userNo}
